name: Touhou Hisoutensoku
description: Touhou Hisoutensoku ~ Chōdokyū Ginyoru no Nazo wo Oe is a versus fighting game in the Touhou Project game series. The game, by Twilight Frontier and Team Shanghai Alice, can be played as a standalone game or as an expansion pack for the previous fighting game Scarlet Weather Rhapsody. In the Touhou Project overall, it is labeled as the 12.3rd Touhou game
